title: Vogue Williams looks radiant as she makes a stylish exit from West End show
text:
She never fails to turn heads with her sensational sense of style.

And Vogue Williams looked radiant as ever as she departed the Piccadilly Theatre in London after seeing Riverdance Heartbeat Of Home on Saturday.

The reality star, 34, cut a stylish figure for the evening, donning a flowing black coat with a v-neckline.

Style: Vogue Williams, 34, looked radiant as ever as she departed the Piccadilly Theatre in London after seeing Riverdance Heartbeat Of Home on Saturday

The presenter added height to her frame with a pair of black strappy heels while she also sported a matching handbag.

Adding a touch of glamour to her look with a silver necklace, Vogue donned a pair of hoop earrings and styled her locks into a chic updo.

Vogue is mother to son Theodore, thirteen months, who she shares with husband and former Made In Chelsea star Spencer Matthews.

Back in June 2018, Vogue and Spencer married in an intimate ceremony in front of family, including his brother James Matthews and his wife Pippa Middleton, at his stunning 10,000-acre family estate, Glen Affric, in Cannich, Scotland.

Fashion: The reality star cut a stylish figure for the evening, donning a flowing black coat with a v-neckline

However, since many of his Made In Chelsea pals were snubbed, the couple decided to hold another wedding in London.

The duo tied the knot at Westminster Boating Base on the banks of the River Thames in September and Spencer's best friend Jamie Laing officiated the ceremony for their second wedding.

Guests included Millie Mackintosh and Hugo Taylor, while Jamie, who was in crutches from his Strictly Come Dancing injury, acted as the vow master.

Outfit: The presenter added height to her frame with a pair of black strappy heels while she also sported a matching handbag

Vogue, who looked incredible in a strapless Kate Halfpenny jumpsuit with a overlay skirt, told Hello!: 'He was so funny, he just made the whole thing hilarious - but he was sweet too, he said such lovely things about us and he knows us both so well, so it worked out perfectly.'

Spencer said: 'We get on so well, laugh all the time, and just don't bicker. I feel like I have married my best friend - twice.

'If I could marry Vogue every year, I would, but two weddings will do. I think we are probably done now.'
description: The reality star, 34, looked radiant as ever as she departed the Piccadilly Theatre in London after seeing Riverdance Heartbeat Of Home on Saturday.
